documentation.text:
@title NodePackages
 @dev Smart contract for a node-based affiliate system with predefined node packages using ERC20 tokens

@dev Constructor that sets the owner to the contract deployer and sets the token
 @param _nodeToken Address of the ERC20 token to be used for purchases and rewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct NodePackages.NodePackage memory[] memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Get all node packages
 @return packages Array of all node packages

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Rewards discount system is not enabled"

arguments.value: Rewards discount system is not enabled

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Rewards discount system is not enabled"

mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct NodePackages.UserNode storage ref))

@dev Get current contract token balance

devdoc.details: Smart contract for a node-based affiliate system with predefined node packages using ERC20 tokens

addMultipleNodePackages(string[],uint256.details: Add multiple node packages at once

params._durationInDays: Duration of the node package in days
params._price: Price of the node package in tokens

returns._0: id of the newly added node package

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the owner to the contract deployer and sets the token

params._nodeToken: Address of the ERC20 token to be used for purchases and rewards

distributeAllPackageProsperityFunds(addr.details: Distribute all ready package prosperity funds (owner only)

returns.totalDistributed: Total amount distributed across all packages

distributePackageProsperityFund(uint256,.details: Distribute prosperity fund for a specific package (owner only)

getAllPackageProsperityFundBalances().details: Get all package prosperity fund balances for current cycle

returns._0: Current balance of tokens held by the contract

getDirectReferralDetails(address,uint256.details: Get the direct referral details for a specific user and package

getNodePackage(uint256).details: Get details of a node package

getPackageProsperityFundBalance(uint256,.details: Get package prosperity fund balance for a specific package and cycle

returns.balance: Fund balance for the package in the specified cycle

getProsperityFundStatus().details: Get the current status of the Prosperity Fund

returns.isReady: Whether the fund is ready for distribution
returns.nextDistribution: Timestamp when the next distribution will be available
returns.percentage: Percentage of each purchase allocated to the fund

getUserAscensionBonusStats(address,uint2.details: Get the ascension bonus stats for a user

returns.referralsToNextReward: Number of referrals needed for next reward
returns.rewardsClaimed: Total rewards claimed through ascension bonus
returns.salesTotal: Current sales total since last reward

getUserNode(address,uint256).details: Get details of a user's node

params._index: Index of the node in the user's array

returns.purchaseTime: Time when the node was purchased

getUserPackageClaimedRewards(address,uin.details: Get the claimed rewards for a user for a specific package

returns._0: claimedRewards Claimed rewards for the package

getUserPackageReferralCount(address,uint.details: Get the number of referrals a user has made for a specific package

returns._0: count Number of referrals made for the specific package

getUserReferralCount(address).details: Get the total number of referrals a user has made across all packages

returns._0: count Total number of referrals made

getUserReferrer(address,uint256).details: Get the referrer for a specific user and package

returns._0: referrer The referrer address for this user and package

getUserTotalClaimedRewards(address).details: Get the total claimed rewards for a user across all packages

getWalletsCount().details: Get the total number of users

hasUserMadePurchase(address).details: Check if a user has made any purchase before

params.user: Address of the user to check

returns.hasPurchased: Whether the user has made any purchase

isPackageProsperityFundReadyForDistribut.details: Check if a package prosperity fund is ready for distribution

returns._0: bool Whether the package fund is ready for distribution

userHoldReward(address,uint256).details: Get the hold reward for a specific user and package

returns._0: holdReward The hold reward for this user and package

isProsperityFundReadyForDistribution().details: Check if the Prosperity Fund is ready for distribution

returns._0: bool Whether the fund is ready for distribution

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchaseNode(uint256,address).details: Purchase a node package using the node token

params._packageId: ID of the node package to purchase

purchaseNodeWithDiscount(uint256,address.details: Purchase a node package using rewards from another package as a discount

params._packageId: ID of the node package to purchase

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMinReferralsForRewards(uint256).details: Update the minimum number of referrals required to claim rewards (owner only)

setNodePackageActive(uint256,bool).details: Set a node package's active status

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBulkReferralSettings(uint256,uint2.details: Update the bulk referral reward settings (owner only)

params._percentage: Percentage of total sales for reward (0-100)
params._threshold: Number of referrals to qualify for bulk reward

updateFirstTimeUserFeeSettings(uint256,a.details: Update first-time user fee settings (owner only)

params._feeAddress: Address to receive first-time user fees

params._id: ID of the node package to update

updateProsperityFundSettings(bool,uint25.details: Update the Prosperity Fund settings (owner only)

params._percentage: Percentage of each purchase to allocate to the fund (0-100)

updateRewardsDiscountSettings(bool,uint2.details: Update the rewards discount settings (owner only)

params._enabled: Whether the discount system is enabled

updateWithdrawLiquiditySettings(bool,uin.details: Configure liquidity withdrawal settings for withdrawRewards function (owner only)

params._liquidityAddress: Address to receive the liquidity portion from rewards
params._withdrawLiquidityEnabled: Whether liquidity withdrawal is enabled for rewards
params._withdrawLiquidityPercentage: Percentage of reward withdrawals to redirect to liquidity (1-100)

withdrawTokens(uint256).details: Withdraw tokens from the contract (owner only)

devdoc.title: NodePackages
